Like Burgers and Hair Spray

Jimmy Kimmel made fun of President Trump on Tuesday for the constant turnover in his administration.

“Trump goes through cabinet members like he goes through cheeseburgers and Aqua Net: fast.” — JIMMY KIMMEL

Mike Pompeo, the head of the Central Intelligence Agency, is set to replace Tillerson.

Do you put up pictures, or do you just live out of a banker’s box, so you can just gather your stuff when it’s time to go?” — JIMMY KIMMEL
